meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>hunt</kanji> <kanji>person</kanji> is a person who hunts. A <vocabulary>hunter</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: You learned the reading of 狩 when you learned the kanji, but the reading for 人 is totally irregular. Just imagine that you're hunting a reindeer named <reading>Rudo</reading>lph (りゅうど). He has an unusually red nose, which makes him easy to spot and puts him at a bit of a disadvantage.
